salads.title: Spicy salad with avocado and blackberry
salads.description: Avocado, fresh blackberries, mixed greens, chili flakes, red onion, lime dressing, toasted seeds

salads.title: Fresh Green Salad with Truffle Oil
salads.description: Baby spinach, arugula, cucumber, green apple, avocado, toasted pine nuts, truffle oil vinaigrette

salads.title: Shrimps with Ginger on Lettuce Leaves
salads.description: Marinated shrimp, fresh ginger, garlic, lime juice, chili flakes, served on crisp lettuce leaves

meat.title: Chef’s Tender Crab
meat.description: Delicately cooked crab meat, citrus butter glaze, fresh herbs, served with a hint of chili and lemon zest

meat.title: Jiaozi with Shrimps & Garlic Dressing
meat.description: Handmade dumplings filled with shrimp, ginger, and chives, served with a rich garlic-soy dressing and a touch of sesame oil

meat.title: Giant Burger with Grilled Beef
meat.description: Grilled beef patty, cheddar cheese, crispy lettuce, tomato, pickles, red onion, house sauce, served in a toasted brioche bun

seafood.title: Thai Piquant King-Size Shrimps
seafood.description: Jumbo shrimps sautéed with Thai chili, garlic, lemongrass, and lime leaves, finished with a spicy tamarind glaze

seafood.title: Rolls with Eel & Green Salad with Parmesan
seafood.description: Sushi rolls filled with tender eel, cucumber, and avocado, served alongside a fresh green salad with shaved parmesan and a light vinaigrette

seafood.title: Canapés with Salmon & Avocado Cream
seafood.description: Smoked salmon atop crispy crackers, topped with creamy avocado spread, garnished with fresh dill and a squeeze of lemon

desserts.title: Homemade Chocolate Edy's Pie
desserts.description: Chocolate crust, creamy vanilla ice cream, dark chocolate glaze, crushed peanuts, whipped cream, chocolate chips

desserts.title: Bittersweet Chocolate Truffles
desserts.description: Rich dark chocolate, heavy cream, cocoa powder, touch of espresso, dusted with cacao

desserts.title: Carrot Roll with Pastry Cream
desserts.description: Moist carrot sponge, smooth vanilla pastry cream, rolled and lightly dusted with icing sugar

coffee.title: Classical Black Coffee with Hot Milk
coffee.description: Freshly brewed black coffee served with steamed hot milk on the side

coffee.title: Cappuccino with Maple Syrup and Coconut
coffee.description: Espresso, steamed milk, a touch of maple syrup, topped with frothed milk and toasted coconut flakes

coffee.title: Latte with Whipped Cream and Chocolate
coffee.description: Smooth espresso, steamed milk, topped with whipped cream and chocolate shavings

juice.title: Lemonade with Passion Fruit and Apple Juice
juice.description: Fresh lemon juice, passion fruit purée, apple juice, served over ice

juice.title: Coconut Lemonade with Cream and Mint
juice.description: Refreshing coconut lemonade, topped with a swirl of cream and garnished with fresh mint leaves

juice.title: Celery Juice with Ginger and Lemon
juice.description: Freshly pressed celery juice, infused with zesty lemon and a kick of ginger
